channel.title: SkyLearn Pre-Filter Test Feed – Unique Articles v3
channel.description: Ten distinct mixed articles for keyword filter validation

item.title: PwC relocates UK headquarters to 2 More London Riverside
item.description: PwC has moved its national HQ from Embankment Place to a new 300,000 sq ft building on London’s South Bank.

item.title: Ed Sheeran to headline Glastonbury 2026 after surprise confirmation
item.description: The singer announced his return to Worthy Farm during a live BBC interview, delighting fans worldwide.

item.title: Lloyds Banking Group signs 15-year lease at new Bristol office campus
item.description: The bank will occupy 180,000 sq ft at Temple Quarter as part of a regional consolidation strategy.

item.title: England to host 2030 Cricket World Cup following ICC vote
item.description: The tournament will return to English grounds for the first time in over a decade.

item.title: Channel 4 opens new northern headquarters in Leeds Dock
item.description: The broadcaster has officially opened its 60,000 sq ft HQ, relocating over 400 employees from London.

item.title: Beyoncé launches exclusive fragrance line in Selfridges
item.description: The pop icon unveiled her first UK perfume collection with a special in-store appearance.

item.title: Amazon expands European data operations with new Dublin tech hub
item.description: The company has leased 220,000 sq ft at a newly completed business park to support cloud infrastructure growth.

item.title: BBC drama wins International Emmy for best limited series
item.description: The award caps a successful year for British television exports.

item.title: Siemens completes relocation to new innovation campus in Milton Keynes
item.description: Siemens has moved 1,200 staff into its purpose-built R&D facility designed to foster cross-team collaboration.

item.title: David Beckham opens youth football academy in Miami
item.description: The ex-England captain launched his latest charitable project aimed at supporting under-privileged young players.
